title: The Failed Experiment
summary: Dr. Lila Tran and her assistant Marcus activate a prototype gene-splicer to accelerate amphibian evolution, hoping to cure human disease. The experiment goes awry when two frogs mutate into humanoid forms, gaining intelligence and speech. Security alarms blare as the mutated frogs escape containment, forcing Lila and Marcus to chase them through the lab, arguing about who is to blame.

title: The Rooftop Standoff
summary: The mutated frog-princes, now calling themselves Ribbick and Croal, reach the rooftop, using their newfound agility to evade capture. Lila corners them and tries to reason with Ribbick, who demands answers about his existence. Marcus arrives with a tranquilizer gun, and Lila must choose between capturing the frog-princes or letting them go to prevent harm.

title: Escape Into the City
summary: Ribbick and Croal leap from the rooftop and disappear into the city, narrowly avoiding Marcus’s tranquilizer darts. Lila and Marcus argue with their superior, Dr. Feld, who threatens to shut down the project unless the escaped frog-princes are recovered. Lila decides to defy orders and find Ribbick and Croal before Feld’s hired security can capture or kill them.

title: Contact in the Sewers
summary: Lila tracks the frog-princes to the city sewers and tries to establish peaceful contact, while Marcus surveils her, ready to report any findings to Feld. Ribbick and Croal confront Lila, demanding her help to reverse their mutation. When security drones enter the sewers, Lila allies with the frog-princes to escape, convincing them that she can help.

title: Betrayal at the Lab
summary: Lila sneaks Ribbick and Croal back into the lab for a reversal procedure, but Marcus, pressured by Feld, betrays her by alerting security. During a tense lab standoff, Ribbick disables the security systems while Croal holds Marcus hostage. Lila is forced to make a deal with Marcus: his silence in exchange for a share of the scientific credit if the cure succeeds.

title: The Reversal Gambit
summary: Lila initiates the reversal process, but the gene-splicer overloads, threatening to destroy the lab. Ribbick volunteers to risk his life by manually stabilizing the core, while Croal debates fleeing for freedom. Croal ultimately chooses to stay and help, and together they avert disaster, but the reversal leaves their fate uncertain.

title: The Final Choice
summary: As Feld and security close in, Lila activates an escape route for Ribbick and Croal, who must choose between returning to their old forms or embracing their new identities. Ribbick decides to remain humanoid and advocate for his new species, while Croal opts for reversal and reassimilation into frog life. Lila covers their escape by confronting Feld, risking her career to ensure their freedom.
